summary:
Summon merchant in any location.
Merchant have [color=yellow]30,000[/color] gold coins.
Sales have wine "bloodmoon" [color=yellow]to quench the vampiric hunger[/color].
Now buying [color=yellow]stolen[/color] items.
Spell Tomes, New spells.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]Description:[/color]
Summon merchant in any location.
15 sec. duration of the spell (indefinitely in the barter menu).
Merchant have [color=yellow]30,000[/color] gold coins.

Sales have [color=yellow]wine[/color] "bloodmoon" [color=yellow]to quench the vampiric hunger[/color].

[color=red]ATTENTION!!![/color]
[color=red]See "What's new in version 1.36"[/color]

When the game begin you will get new [color=red]talent[/color].

[color=yellow]*New spell tomes coming soon![/color]
Check for updates.

[color=yellow]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim v1.9.32.0 or later.

[color=yellow]Credits:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3572899]Renegade1979[/url] (beta test; unique model of bottle).
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2342239]Mikanoshi[/url] (script for object positioning).

[color=yellow]Version info:[/color]

[color=yellow]1.38/1.39/1.4[/color]
* Some fixes.

[color=yellow]1.37[/color]
* 30,000 coins )
* Fixed bug.

[color=red]ATTENTION!!![/color]
[color=yellow]What's new in version 1.36:[/color]
* When the game begin you will get new [color=red]talent[/color], not spell.
* Now the merchant has only 20,000 coins.
* Crown & Vampire Cloak - [color=red]On/Off talents[/color] (like Waterwalking).
* Expanded range of products.
* Some scripts are optimized.
* Some fixes.

[color=yellow]1.35[/color]
* Some fixes.

[color=yellow]1.34[/color]
* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Waterbreathing for All.[/b]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Waterwalking [color=yellow]on/off[/color] talent.[/b]
[i]-You can enable or disable waterwalking ability.[/i]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Absorb Dragon Souls talent.[/b]
[i]-If the dragon was killed but his soul is not absorbed, use this talent near the dragon.[/i]

[color=yellow]1.33[/color]
* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Strangulation.[/b]
[i]-Just like "vampiric grip" (dawnguard) + telekinesis.[/i]

* Expanded range of products.

[color=yellow]1.32[/color]
* [color=red]fixed dialogue bug.[/color]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Telekinetic Fist.[/b]
[i]-Telekinetic Fist without "slowtime effect".[/i]

[color=yellow]1.31[/color]
* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Vampire Cloak.[/b]
[i]-Work if you in combat.[/i]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Make Player Friend.[/b]

[color=yellow]1.30[/color]
* "Telekinetic Fist" now has "slowtime effect".
[i]- Try it now!!![/i]

[color=yellow]1.29[/color]
* Some fixes.

[color=yellow]1.28[/color]
* [color=red]Critical bug fixed!!![/color]

* Human Hearts added.

[color=yellow]1.27[/color]
* Now you can remove "Crown" or "NoFallingDamage" abilities.
[i]- Use merchant's dialog...[/i]

[color=yellow]1.26[/color]
* Swarm more powerfull and costless.

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] No Falling Damage.[/b]

[color=yellow]1.25[/color]
* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Swarm.[/b]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Crows on my pauldron.[/b]
[i]-See the screenshots...[/i]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Conjure Horse.[/b]
[i]-Great spirit, thunder birds fly
-We are wild and free
-To fight and die by the open sky
-Spirit horse ride for me[/i]
[color=yellow](c)[/color]Manowar

[color=yellow]1.22[/color]
* Plugin renamed: SummonShadowMerchant.

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Rocket.[/b]
[i]- Rocketing people up. Like a meteor.[/i]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Resurrect Dead.[/b]
[i]- Resurrect companions, creatures, friends, enemy, etc.[/i]

[color=yellow]1.2[/color]
* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Conjure Dragon Priest.[/b]

* [b][color=orange]Spell Tome:[/color] Telekinetic Fist.[/b]

* Expanded range of products.

[color=yellow]1.01[/color]
* Now buying [color=red]stolen[/color] items.

* Added some soulgems, and Daedra Hearts.

[color=yellow]1.00[/color] - first uploaded version.

Sorry for my English, I am from Russia.

[b]Rocket Spell (only)[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11451]Rocket Spell[/url]
[b]Absorb Dragon Souls talent (only)[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31909/]Absorb Dragon Souls Spell[/url]
author: xdarkness
